## errorWhen() function

Helper function that will return a [CaseError](./case-plugin-base.caseerror.md) if the test condition is met, or a non-erroring [MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md) otherwise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
errorWhen: (test: boolean, err: CaseError | Array<CaseError>) => MatchResult
```

</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md)

a [MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md) containing the errors if `test` is true, or a passing [MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md) otherwise.
